details: Asterix and Cleopatra (French: Astérix et Cléopâtre) is a 1968 Belgian–French animated comedy film; it is the second Asterix adventure to be made into a feature film.

challenge.prompt: What animated movie is this quote taken from?
challenge.text:
Special iced arsenic cake
 means that we can safely take
  seats beside the river Nile
  to see the sacred crocodile
  EAT!
  THE!
  GAULS!
